survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
awesome! currently at the starting point
there's a twig heading left to an island with a tiger. where should i go next?
follow the left twig to the island with the tiger
got it, on the tiger island
now where?
follow the twig next to the rock to the island with the parrot and the elephant
okay, made it to the parrot and elephant island
where to now?
travel between the parrot and the elephant and cross the rocks onto the island with the frog
alright, now i'm hanging with the frog on the new island
where to now?
cross over the crocodile to go back onto the island with the elephant
back on the elephant island
where to next?
use the set of rocks next to the elephant to go to the island with the giraffe
ok, now i'm next to the giraffe
what's next?
cross over the twig onto the island with the snake
done, now i'm next to the snake
where to now?
walk to the treasure
i found the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
ok
first off, lets stroll a bit to the left from where you're standing with the white dog, walk below that wooden bench and follow that path until you see the florist's stand
but don't quite get there! twirl 180 degrees left, cross the trail again and head back towards our fluffy white friend. sound good?
I am next to the log
perfect! now, leap over that branch like an athlete, and continue straight down the map
you should spot another furry white friend near a checkered picnic blanket!
I am next to the dog on the picnic blanket.
awesome! now, strut over that picnic blanket, maybe grab a berry from the bowl, and let's head to your left
ok
did you see another wooden branch around? if yes, we are going to cross the river again but this time, heading north
it's bridge time, buddy!
I  am next to the couple sitting down by the bridge.
great! now the tricky part: see that green bush? give it a wide circle to your right until you reach the florist's stand
I am at the stand
nice! now let's shimmy left and pass beneath the stand until we get to a big bridge
you'll notice two cyclers, say hi if you like!
I have passed the cyclers.
awesome! just a bit further and you'll see two elderly folks chilling on a bench, reading the papers
enjoy the view!
I am next to the couple on the bench.
perfect! now, shimmy a few steps south, squeeze between the oldies and a wooden branch
you'll find a familiar friend, a green bush right by the end of the branch. be there friend
I am next to the bush
well done! now, spin east and walk between the branch and the bush
keep it steady!

chat.msg: hola!!! ya comenzamos?
Walk down so you are standing to the left of the dog
alright! just moved south and i'm now chilling with the dog
what next?
Walk underneath the dog to your east, when you reach the end of the dog walk above the campfire and wait
done! i'm above the campfire, feeling the heat
what's next, amigo?
Walk between the campfire and the mushrooms to get on the trail next to the front of the blue car
cool, now i'm standing next to the front of the blue car
the open road is ahead! what's the next move?
Walk west until you get to a split in the road
went west and hit a fork
which way now, my friend?
Walk south, away the campfire, and follow the trail. Stop When you reach the telescope.
ta-da! made it to the telescope
this game is a blast! where to now?
Cut between the telescope and the bush immediately east of it and wait undernearth the telescope
gotcha! i'm now beneath the telescope and the bush is tickling me a bit haha
Walk to the west, and follow the trail of rocks connected to the telescope until you reach the cabin

okay, followed the rocks and guess what? i've made it to the cabin! *finished* 

this was fun, where to next?

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
I'm ready
cool! let's head southwest under the nearest palm tree. don't forget to turn right when you cross the second one
turn left before getting to the third and go straight south. easy-peasy, right?
How far south do I go?
just a few steps. then, you'll wanna move towards that cute brown puppy on your left
turn slightly left and then swing back right going south. carry on, mate!
ok, i am at the rocks south of the third palm tree.
nice! now, move between the big rock on your left and the small one on your right
ocean should be right ahead. go get some sea breeze!
I am at the shoreline
fab! spot the red crab? head right along the big rock, staying close to the water
keep pushing west, buddy!
How far west?
until you come across a medium-sized rock
when you spot a shark in the water, make a sharp right. don't worry, it's friendlier than it looks!
Ok I am next to the volleyball.
great! head back towards the land. go between that volleyball and the medium rock
now, keep moving north. you got this!
I am on the otherside of the volley ball
keep going, mate! veer slightly to the left, heading northwest
you'll see a cool red tent on your left and a big speaker on your right
I am between the speaker and the tent
perfect! now, go around that tent in an arc
it's like a little detour, ain't it?
Ok
now head south, and don't stop till you see the sea
but don't get your feet wet this time!
Ok, I am close to the ocean but not in it.
brilliant! now, spot the red kayak? head right below it and keep going west
Ok I am next to the kayak on the west side.
great! now, turn north and walk alongside that kayak
I am at the top of the kayak by the bush and the paddle.
well done, pal! now relax by that small green bush
you made it! thanks for the great adventure!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
